result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ga: bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.orig: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.html: bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ponchtml: ḃrúiġ an fear a ẛrón in aġaiḋ na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
